highlights: We shipped an improved experience for users who signed up for a trial of Dropbox Pro on iOS
I shipped the ability for any internal email campagin to automatically sign users into their account
I created a proof-of-concept GraphQL API on top of the Dropbox HTTP API

work.summary: Capsule is a newer, better, kinder, smarter pharmacy. My partner and I started helping Capsule as the first individual contributors. We grew the product from an idea to an implementation, taking on many roles along the way.
highlights: We created both the API and web app while navigating PHI and HIPAA privacy and security compliance
We wrote a REST API in Go for client apps to access patients, prescriptions, medications, orders, and more
We created an internal app that allowed pharmacists to fill prescriptions, interact with patients, and interface with existing pharmacy management systems
We implemented a React app for exercising the patient and pharmacy flow, which became the production web app
We set up practices for documentation, code reviews, snippets, weekly check-ins, etc.
We screened, interviewed, and mentored engineers joining the team

work.summary: Asana is the easiest way for teams to track their work. I joined Asana's growth team, emphasizing frequent experimentation and statistical rigor. I later joined the infrastructure team to work on the performance-focused V2 of the Luna framework that Asana is built on.
highlights: I owned and exceeded the KR for launching A/B tests
We designed, implemented, and converted existing code to use a new access control language
We authored a TypeScript model generator for the Luna V2 API
I shipped product features like comment pinning and the file attachments view
I made numerous contributions to Asana's internal processes, including bayesian A/B testing and gender-neutral interview feedback

work.summary: Foursquare helps you find the perfect places to go with friends. I joined Foursquare's growth team as a server engineer working primarily in Scala. I later transitioned to become the growth team's primary Android engineer.
highlights: I measured and analyzed the impact of new features and experiments on key metrics for new users (e.g. conversion, retention) using Hive, Vertica, and Graphite
I owned and implemented the sign-up flow, onboarding flow, and Facebook integration on Foursquare for Android
I shipped a Netflix-style "ratings game" that helps power place recommendations on Foursquare for Android
I developed an open-source project in Go for Google App Engine and command-line to help third-party developers create Google+ applications
I helped support users' ability to export their Google Buzz information using Google Takeout

work.summary: TextNow gives you free texting and calling. At TextNow, I implemented the web version of the product using SproutCore, allowing users to send and receive texts in real time.
highlights: I designed and implemented a 100k+ concurrent connection server using Tornado (Python) to support browser push notifications
I led the effort to redesign the internal API as a RESTful web service
I was a major contributor to the launch of DB Engine Version Management
I made numerous improvements to the team's internal monitoring tools
I developed an internal, proof-of-concept BlackBerry app that showcased a new Bluetooth and Wi-Fi technology under research.

skills.name: It's been a while since I used
